snippet: The I.C.C. is examining what happened to religious sites in Timbuktu. Will it look next at the destruction in Palmyra?
lead_paragraph: The I.C.C. is examining what happened to religious sites in Timbuktu. Will it look next at the destruction in Palmyra?
